title: AILint Provenance Statement
description: Declarative schema for explicit AI provenance signaling.

ai_involved.description: Indicates whether AI systems contributed to the content.

confidence.description: Optional self-reported confidence in the declaration.

reference.description: Optional reference ID linking to extended provenance metadata.

tool.description: Optional information about the AI tool used.

name.description: Name of the AI system or tool.

timestamp.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp when AI contribution occurred.

scope.description: Optional scope of the provenance statement.
